location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government at Bombay to William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing a letter to Sir Evan Nepean from Petamber Vulloo on behalf of Jadowjee Nunon, dated 24 January 1816. Jadowjee Nunon's [Jadowjee Naran] boat Sullamut Savoy [Salamat Savoy] was captured by Joasamee [Qasimi] pirates off Muscat. Warden requests that Bruce send a letter to the Joasamee chief demanding the return of the boat and that reparations be paid.
